body_html: Can we add the sanity checks to ensure new PRs are correctly formatted, but grandfather the existing style violations ? That will simplify the merging of this PR into our internal repository by reducing the number of merge conflicts to deal with. If needs be, we can always gradually fix the formatting in several smaller PRs spread over time.

body: Can we add the sanity checks to ensure new PRs are correctly formatted, but grandfather the existing style violations ? That will simplify the merging of this PR into our internal repository by reducing the number of merge conflicts to deal with. If needs be, we can always gradually fix the formatting in several smaller PRs spread over time.
